com.hazelcast.client.spi

Interface ClientTransactionManagerService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientTransactionManagerServiceImpl

    public interface ClientTransactionManagerService
    Manages the execution of client transactions and provides TransactionContexts. Client equivalent of TransactionManagerService.

    • Method Summary
